snippet.title: Relic Space: Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Relic Space launches in Steam Early Access in Q3 2021.
* Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1146420/Relic_Space/
* Join the Discord for Alpha Access: https://discord.gg/gZA84Kz262
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FourfoldGames
* Website: https://www.fourfoldgames.com/relicspace
